section.title: Purpose
section.lines: Generate the java implementation for MML Classes and Enumerations (used by components)

body.section:
Where to find what
Plugin id: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation
Main class: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation.JavaBeanGenerator
In mdf-core:
com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.BeanGeneratorFactory which uses the following JET templates:
Jet template Jet compiled template
templates/models/DomainBeanGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.DomainBeanGenerator
templates/models/BeanGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.BeanGenerator
templates/models/DatasetBeanGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.DatasetBeanGenerator
templates/models/DatasetXBeanGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.DatasetXBeanGenerator
